Description: This guitar is functionally and aesthetically perfect. Recently restrung with factory default strings. Comes with factory soft bag. I think the price is fair for this guitar but you're welcome to drop me a note with lower offers, which I'll consider if relisting. The Traveler Guitar EG-1 Custom is a full 24 ¾-inch scale electric travel guitar. The proprietary In-Body tuning system uses standard tuning machines relocated into the body to create a guitar that has a full-scale neck, yet is substantially shorter than full size electrics. The lack of a headstock and a small, ergonomic body allow the guitar to be 27% shorter and 50% lighter than a full-size electric, all while preserving the same full-scale playing experience you’re used to.The guitar features active electronics with our proprietary 4-channel headphone amplifier built-in, allowing you to practice privately at full shred, without waking the neighbors. Cycle through clean, boost, overdrive and distortion tones using the custom tap-pot and listen through your headphones or favorite amp. In addition, the EG-1 Custom includes the Shadow E-tuner, a chromatic tuner built-into the pickup ring always ready to go, so you don't need to carry extra gear. The jackplate has an aux-in so you can plug in your mobile device and play along with your favorite tracks.
Title: Traveler Guitar EG-1 Gloss Black
